channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time And Tide
channel.desc: The yokai Ubume was said to be a ghostly woman appearing at night, asking passersby to hold her child under threat of death. We examine how this terrifying figure came to be seen as a sympathetic one.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: Discover the unique, traditional method of roof thatching that uses Hinoki cypress bark.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Face To Face
channel.desc: Imamura Shogo is a writer of historical fiction who showcases unlikely protagonists to explore modern issues. He talks about his methodology and his efforts to keep paper books alive.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design Museum Japan
channel.desc: Aichi / Kataoka Mami (curator) Tokoname, a pottery town with over 900 years of history, creates products appropriate for the times. Kataoka finds the beauty that's present in functional objects.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Who Will Protect The
channel.desc: From Wengding Village in Yunnan Province, known as "China's last traditional village," the Wa people were relocated amidst tourism development, causing disruption in the lives of the ethnic minority.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Perfect 2 Hour Guide
channel.desc: Explore Izumo Oyashiro, one of Japan's most iconic and sacred shrines. With 1,300 years of history and countless myths, this ultimate two-hour tour reveals its deep spiritual and cultural appeal.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time And Tide
channel.desc: The yokai Ubume was said to be a ghostly woman appearing at night, asking passersby to hold her child under threat of death. We examine how this terrifying figure came to be seen as a sympathetic one.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: Discover the unique, traditional method of roof thatching that uses Hinoki cypress bark.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design ? Stories
channel.desc: Today's Theme: The New Potential of Sharing. Sharing is a smart idea that strengthens relationships. From a diverse array of shared spaces to self-help devices, dive into designs for a shared future.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Texico
channel.desc: Learn the principles of programming without a computer. Animated characters provide fun and lucid explanations of 5 core processes: analysis, combination, generalization, abstraction, and simulation.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Professionals
channel.desc: A documentary series that focuses on first-class professionals from various fields.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: What is causing the frequent torrential rain and floods in Japan? Linear rainbands. Find out why this phenomenon is hard to predict and the latest research on forecasting linear rainbands.

channel.name: NHK World JP

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Journey
channel.desc: Tokachi is in Japan's great northern land of Hokkaido, home to vast fields and sprawling pastures. Experience its vibrant summer colors through time-lapse photography.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cinematic Journey
channel.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.
